1441150.name: Spooky Night Remastered
1441150.description:
Hey Everybody!
We have completely remastered the entire game graphics, controllers, effects and play through. Providing a more visually appealing and fun game play.
Grimelda is still at it but with some new tricks and treats in store! Spooky Night Remastered is a Casual Fantasy FPS for the whole family We have overhauled and updated the original Spooky Night VR game also available for the Oculus Quest. Its Halloween night and your walking past a cemetery when you notice a pot of sweet delicious candy.Suddenly, out of nowhere a voice appears, It's the witch Grimelda! She has trapped you inside and you must survive and fight your way out. Defeat her minions and keep the candy, but should you lose you will become one of her minions forever! Fight your way through 7 challenging levels as you defeat, Skeletons, Zombies,Mummy's,Werewolf's, Orcs, and Dragons.Also collect treats and tricks along the way.

Will you survive this Spooky Night ?
1441150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
